questions.question: What is the primary color of the phone case's frame?
What material appears to constitute the majority of the case?
Describe the overall shape of the protective phone case?
What secondary color accents are visible on the case's sides?
Does the case appear to offer transparency to showcase the phone?
What is the apparent finish of the phone case's outer surface?
Judging from the image, is the case designed for a particular phone model?
Considering the design, what is the case's main function?
Based on visual inspection, is the case's frame rigid or flexible?
Does the image suggest any noticeable texture on the case's surface?
Is the camera cutout of the case precisely aligned with the phone's camera?
Are there any visible markings or logos on the phone case itself?
Does the case seem to cover the phone's entire perimeter?
Does the visual representation indicate a single or double layer design?
Based on the image's details, is the case easily detachable from the phone?
